the astral express crew

The Astral Express crew, also known as the Trailblazers, is a group in Honkai: Star Rail which operates from the Astral Express. They follow the Path of The Trailblaze and are considered a subgroup of The Nameless.

TrailBlazer

He is awakened during the opening events of the game by Kafka and Silver Wolf, who leave them to be found by March 7th and Dan Heng.

Himeko

An adventurous scientist who encountered and repaired a stranded train as a child, she now ventures across the universe.

Welt

Welt is a seasoned member of the Astral Express Crew and the former sovereign of Anti-Entropy who has saved Earth from annihilation time and time again.

March 7th

An enthusiastic girl who was saved from eternal ice by the Astral Express Crew, and has the unique ability of being able to use "Six-Phased Ice."

Dan Heng

The cold and reserved train guard and archivist of the Astral Express. Wielding a spear named Cloud-Piercer.
